Exactly! That's what I'm sayin'.

Wouldn't it be a hoot if Frank himself bl=
asted the guy. But that isn't the mature way..... ;)

  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: threadsintyme@... 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
 =
 Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 5:52 AM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auc=
tion for sorta Frank's Box?






  Why don't some of us respond to his ad.=
..and take serious issue with this business of his lying to the public abou=
t Frank? 

  That info is a serious breach of eBay policy. He could be bann=
ed from eBay for life. 
  Al
  ---------- Original Message ----------
  Fro=
m: "Kristin Morris" <ckmorris95@...>
  To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om>
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?
  Date=
: Thu, 21 May 2009 06:16:27 -0500




  WOW.. Frank.  I didn=92t realize yo=
u were charging =96 and =93thousands of dollars=94 to boot!  Must be to pay=
 for that Faraday Cage and the white noise generator thing this yahoo belie=
ves are in all your creations.  And hurry because =93his supplier=94 (cough=
 =96 cough Radio Shack) is discontinuing!  But no worries he has =93sold ov=
er 2 dozen of these =91Frank=92s Boxes devices=94 so he must be legit becau=
se he knows =96 and actual customer bought a =91real=92 Frank=92s Box and s=
aid it was equal!  Awesome=85

  k




------------------------------------=
------------------------------------------

  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com=
 [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of ourobouros2k2
  Sent: Thursd=
ay, May 21, 2009 12:50 AM
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: [EVP-ITC=
] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?








  Been following this unp=
rofessional idiot's items for awhile now. I love how he says that Frank cha=
rges thousands of dollars for an original Frank's box. 

  This dude is the=
 worst type of con, preying on people who know only enough to be familiar w=
ith the term Frank's box. Then again, it always has bothered me when people=
 take shack hacks and charge stupid prices for them on ebay under the Frank=
's box moniker.

  This guy is based out of Nevada I believe, and his group=
's ethics leave little to be desired. Takes all kinds, I reckon...

  Andy
=

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Aquarius <laustin@...> wrote:
  >
  > Hm=
mm... saw this on Ebay tonight... you've got to read all the text to hear
 =
 > how he describes what he's selling. 
  > 
  > Do any of you on this list=
 know who he is? I just thought this was kind of
  > interesting... see:
  =
> 
  > http://tinyurl.com/o5pper
  > 
  > Cheers,
  > 
  > Leslie, consiste=
nt lurker and occasional poster <g>
  > 
  > "I'm not happy, I'm cheerful. =
There's a difference. A happy woman has no
  > cares at all. A cheerful wom=
an has cares but has learned how to deal with them."
  > 
  > -- Beverly Si=
lls (1929-) American Opera Singer
  >
